TestCase.TestCaseObjective: Verify the ability to update and exchange the contents of a BSO contained in an Overlay.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A updates a BSO which is contained in an Overlay which was previously exchanged between the two nations' C2IS. Nation B receives the update and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a topic, which includes the message elements belonging to the Overlay. Nation B has subscribed to this topic. The Overlay was already exchanged after it was created by Nation A so that it is available on both systems.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the Overlay with the updated BSO is displayed correctly on both Nationsâ€™ C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A updates a BSO contained in a previously exchanged Overlay.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the update correctly.
